code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://storyexpress.herokuapp.com'});export var fetchAllMovie=function fetchAllMovie(){return API.get('/movie/');};export var addToFavourite=function addToFavourite(movie){return API.post('/movie/add',movie);};export var fetchFav=function fetchFav(){return API.get('/movie/fetchFav');};export var deleteFav=function deleteFav(movie){return API.post('/movie/deleteFav',movie);};
